Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Activity
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Course
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Conflict
    public class Course
extends Activity
    Creates a course object which is used for registration, scheduling, etc. on the WolfScheduler. Contains fields such as meeting days, start and end time, credit hours, course title, course name, course section, and instructor id. Methods include getters and setters for fields, and overrides isDupliate and get display array to accustom the Course class. Course is a subclass of Activity.
    Author:
    msabrams

    • Constructor Detail

      • Course

        public Course​(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String section,
              int credits,
              java.lang.String instructorId,
              java.lang.String meetingDays)
        Creates a Course with the given name, title, section, credits, instructorId, and meetingDays for courses that are arranged.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name for the course
        title - is the title of the course
        section - is the section of the course
        credits - is the credits of the course
        instructorId - is the instructor's id who teaches the course
        meetingDays - is the meeting days for the course
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name is null, has a length less than 5 or more than 8, does not contain a space between letter characters and number characters, has less than 1 or more than 4 letter characters, and not exactly three trailing digit characters, section is null/empty, the section does not have a length of three, or contains non-digit characters, credits parameter is less than MIN_CREDITS or greater than MAX_CREDITS, instructor id is null or empty, meetingDays is null/empty, contains invalid characters, or title is null or empty.

      • Course

        public Course​(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String section,
              int credits,
              java.lang.String instructorId,
              java.lang.String meetingDays,
              int startTime,
              int endTime)
        Constructs a Course object with values for all fields.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name for the course
        title - is the title of the course
        section - is the section of the course
        credits - is the credits of the course
        instructorId - is the instructor's id who teaches the course
        meetingDays - is the meeting days for the course
        startTime - is the time when the course starts
        endTime - is the time when the course ends
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name is null, has a length less than 5 or more than 8, does not contain a space between letter characters and number characters, has less than 1 or more than 4 letter characters, and not exactly three trailing digit characters, section is null/empty, the section does not have a length of three, or contains non-digit characters, credits parameter is less than MIN_CREDITS or greater than MAX_CREDITS, instructor id is null or empty, meetingDays is null/empty, contains invalid characters, or start/end time has invalid times for a standard 24 hour day, or title is null or empty.

        Specified by:

      • setMeetingDaysAndTime

        public void setMeetingDaysAndTime​(java.lang.String meetingDays,
                                  int startTime,
                                  int endTime)
        Sets meeting days and time. Throws IllegalArgumentException if meeting days is null/empty, contains invalid characters, or start/end time is/are invalid. Overrides setMeetingDaysAndTime in Activity class to check for specific invalid characters for Course objects.
        Overrides:
        setMeetingDaysAndTime in class Activity
        Parameters:
        meetingDays - is the meetingDays which is set for a course
        startTime - is the startTime which is set for a course
        endTime - is the endTime which is set for a course
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if meetingDays, startTime, endTime is/are invalid.

      • meetingDaysHasInvalidCharacters

        public boolean meetingDaysHasInvalidCharacters​(java.lang.String meetingDays)
        Parses meeting days for invalid characters
        Parameters:
        meetingDays - is the meetingDays which need to be checked
        Returns:
        true if meetingDays has invalid characters and false if no invalid characters are found.

      • isDuplicate

        public boolean isDuplicate​(Activity activity)
        Checks to see if two courses are duplicates. A course and an activity are duplicates if the activity is a course object and shares the same name. Implemented as a required method of the abstract Activities class.
        Specified by:
        isDuplicate in class Activity
        Parameters:
        activity - is the activity which is checked as a duplicate
        Returns:
        true if the course and activity are duplicates, and false otherwise.
